name: PWA Budget Tracker
description: A PWA app that tracks your expenses and income. Is mobile installable and can also be used offline; when user is back online the data will be updated so it can be used anytime and the user does not have to worry about lost data.

name: Sneaker Bay
description: SneakerBay is a full stack single page application using Mongoose, Express.js React, and Node.js, where users can buy and sell the latest sneakers.

name: Sports Buzz
description: Sports Buzz is a full-stack web application using Node.js, Express.js, and Sequelize, that presents live and scheduled NBA games, NBA related news, as well as pages for updated scores and user comments about the game.

name: Hulu Clone
description: A clone of the Hulu application using Tailwind CSS, React, and Node.js.
